p: An unidentified species of the large weevil genus Myllocerus sp. Sch√∂nherr has caused recurring damage on leaflets of C. micronesica and several other Cycas species in cultivation. The only in situ locality that we have observed Myllocerus damage to C. micronesica leaves was an area of occupancy adjacent to a golf course. The horticultural trees in the golf course likely sustained the localized weevil populations.
